column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Love this place! Never dissapoints! I try to come here atleast once a year
column2: which still isn't enough! This place has lots of seating
column4: where I have seen Flamenco dancers perform before. I have done the pinxtos before where you get an assortment of 6 tapas. I also love the beef tenderloin and blue cheese
column6: patatas bravas and of course the paella!
